Detailed Description

template<typename Var>
struct WatchInRangeConstraint< Var >

constraints;w-inrange Description The constraint w-inrange(x, [a,b]) ensures that a <= x <= b. constraints;w-inrange References See also

help constraints w-notinrange

template<typename Var>
int WatchInRangeConstraint< Var >::dynamic_trigger_count (  )  [inline, virtual]

Defines the number of dynamic triggers the constraint wants. Must be implemented by any constraint.

Checks if an assignment is satisfied.

Definition at line 75 of file dynamic_inrange.h.

template<typename Var>
virtual bool WatchInRangeConstraint< Var >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.
